name: facade
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, this move has double power.
short_effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Boosts ATTACK when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.
flavor_text.emerald: Boosts ATTACK when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that is boosted if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
